name: Suzzle - The Space Puzzle
description:
Suzzle - The Space Puzzle 

A 3D platformer of an astronaut who have to navigate a series of space labs avoiding the danger of enemies and tricky , and collecting keys to pass through closed doors. 

The game is built as part of an online course titled "Game Design and Development 4: 3D Platformer" by Michigan State University  and hosted on Coursera. 

Changes include: 

  • UI: 
    • Add credit information to main menu
  • Music: 
    • Change background music to more relax music to encourage exploration.
    • Credit to Darite @ https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1067449 
  • Level Design:
    • Used less hostile design to encourage exploration. 
    • Create two different level with clear progression to convey the game mechanic and the idea of the game:
    • Level 1:
      • Teaches player basic control
      • Obstacle is overcome by utilizing Jump and Double Jump 
      • Basic key and door connection 
      • Make player understand how to win 
    • Level 2: 
      • Introduce maze concept  
    • Level 3: 
      • Introduce enemies and moving platforms
